code:
// Currency utility functions

// Format amount with currency symbol
export const formatCurrency = (amount, currency = {
  code: 'USD',
  symbol: '$'
}) => {
  if (amount === null || amount === undefined) return `${currency.symbol}0.00`;
  const numAmount = parseFloat(amount);
  if (isNaN(numAmount)) return `${currency.symbol}0.00`;

  // Special formatting for different currencies
  switch (currency.code) {
    case 'JPY':
    case 'KRW':
    case 'VND':
      return `${currency.symbol}${Math.round(numAmount).toLocaleString()}`;
    case 'INR':
      return `${currency.symbol}${numAmount.toFixed(2).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',')}`;
    default:
      return `${currency.symbol}${numAmount.toFixed(2).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',')}`;
  }
};

// Convert amount between currencies (basic conversion - in production, use real exchange rates)
export const convertCurrency = (amount, fromCurrency, toCurrency) => {

    'JOD': 0.71,
    'LBP': 1500,
    'SYP': 1250,
    'IQD': 1460,
    'IRR': 42000,
    'AFN': 85.5,
    'PKR': 155.5,
    'BDT': 85.5,
    'LKR': 198.5,

    'SBD': 8.05,
    'VUV': 115,
    'XPF': 105,

    'BMD': 1,
    'KYD': 0.83,
    'XCD': 0.37,
    'BBD': 2,
    'TTD': 6.75,
    'JMD': 154.5,
    'HTG': 95.5,

    'SHP': 0.73,
    'FKP': 0.73,
    'GIP': 0.73,
    'ISK': 125
  };
  const fromRate = conversionRates[fromCurrency] || 1;
  const toRate = conversionRates[toCurrency] || 1;
  return amount / fromRate * toRate;
};

sourcesContent:
// Currency utility functions

// Format amount with currency symbol
export const formatCurrency = (amount, currency = { code: 'USD', symbol: '$' }) => {
  if (amount === null || amount === undefined) return `${currency.symbol}0.00`;
  
  const numAmount = parseFloat(amount);
  if (isNaN(numAmount)) return `${currency.symbol}0.00`;
  
  // Special formatting for different currencies
  switch (currency.code) {
    case 'JPY':
    case 'KRW':
    case 'VND':
      return `${currency.symbol}${Math.round(numAmount).toLocaleString()}`;
    case 'INR':
      return `${currency.symbol}${numAmount.toFixed(2).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',')}`;
    default:
      return `${currency.symbol}${numAmount.toFixed(2).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',')}`;
  }
};

// Get currency symbol by code
export const getCurrencySymbol = (currencyCode) => {
  const currencyMap = {
    'USD': '$',
    'EUR': '€',
    'GBP': '£',

    'LAK': '₭',

    'UZS': 'so\'m',
    'KGS': 'с',

    'GTQ': 'Q'
  };
  
  return currencyMap[currencyCode] || '$';
};

    'GTQ': 'Guatemalan Quetzal',
    'ILS': 'Israeli Shekel',
    'YER': 'Yemeni Rial',
    'SOS': 'Somali Shilling',
    'DJF': 'Djiboutian Franc',
    'ERN': 'Eritrean Nakfa',
    'KMF': 'Comorian Franc',
    'MGA': 'Malagasy Ariary',
    'MUR': 'Mauritian Rupee',
    'SCR': 'Seychellois Rupee',
    'SHP': 'Saint Helena Pound',
    'FKP': 'Falkland Islands Pound',
    'GIP': 'Gibraltar Pound',
    'ISK': 'Icelandic Króna'
  };
  
  return currencyMap[currencyCode] || 'Unknown Currency';
};

// Convert amount between currencies (basic conversion - in production, use real exchange rates)
export const convertCurrency = (amount, fromCurrency, toCurrency) => {
  // This is a simplified conversion - in production, you'd use real exchange rates
  // For now, we'll use some basic conversion rates
  const conversionRates = {
    'USD': 1,
    'EUR': 0.85,

    'MAD': 8.95,
    'EGP': 15.65,
    'DZD': 135.5,
    'TND': 2.85,
    'LYD': 4.55,
    'SDG': 55.5,
    'SAR': 3.75,
    'AED': 3.67,
    'QAR': 3.64,
    'KWD': 0.30,
    'BHD': 0.38,
    'OMR': 0.38,
    'JOD': 0.71,
    'LBP': 1500,
    'SYP': 1250,
    'IQD': 1460,
    'IRR': 42000,
    'AFN': 85.5,
    'PKR': 155.5,
    'BDT': 85.5,
    'LKR': 198.5,
    'NPR': 118.5,
    'BTN': 74.5,
    'MVR': 15.45,
    'MMK': 1650,
    'KHR': 4050,
    'LAK': 9500,
    'MNT': 2850,
    'KZT': 425,
    'UZS': 10500,
    'KGS': 84.5,
    'TJS': 11.35,
    'TMT': 3.5,
    'AZN': 1.7,
    'GEL': 3.15,
    'AMD': 485,
    'UAH': 27.5,
    'BYN': 2.55,
    'MDL': 17.85,
    'RUB': 75.5,
    'NZD': 1.45,
    'FJD': 2.05,
    'PGK': 3.55,
    'SBD': 8.05,
    'VUV': 115,
    'XPF': 105,
    'WST': 2.55,
    'TOP': 2.25,
    'BMD': 1,
    'KYD': 0.83,
    'XCD': 0.37,
    'BBD': 2,
    'TTD': 6.75,
    'JMD': 154.5,

    'DOP': 58.5,

    'MGA': 3950,
    'MUR': 40.5,
    'SCR': 20.5,
    'SHP': 0.73,
    'FKP': 0.73,
    'GIP': 0.73,
    'ISK': 125
  };
  
  const fromRate = conversionRates[fromCurrency] || 1;
  const toRate = conversionRates[toCurrency] || 1;
  
  return (amount / fromRate) * toRate;
};
